nodes.text: Merchant Row was an avenue on the Outer Rim planet Batuu, located within the boundaries of Black Spire Outpost. Running from Docking Bay 7 to Docking Bay 9, the row included Docking Bay 7 Food and Cargo, Dok-Ondar's Den of Antiquities, Oga's Cantina, the Milk Stand, and First Order Cargo. In 34 ABY, the area was more recently-built than other parts of the outpost.

Merchant Row was named on one of a set of trading cards available at Disney's December 16, 2017 "Galactic Nights" session, which covered locations for the then-upcoming Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge attraction. It shared a card with Docking Bay 9, which, like other cards, possessed a portion of an Aurebesh poem on the border. That card's section read "A BEACON FOR DRIFTERS."
